name: Otherworldly Bounty: Prototype v0.1.1
description:
Otherworldly bounty is a stylish movement shooter game under development, currently on prototype state, meaning there's a lot of placeholders.

This build features one character and one level, in later builds there will be more playable characters, each with a different gameplay style and lotsa new features!

Join the discord for this and other project updates!: https://discord.gg/Zyg2ADuYnA

//Controls and info//

  • H to heal
  • 1, 2 for weapons slots
  • Weapons regenerate ammo with time, if you holster them they begin regenerating it faster
  • Hud:
